title: Ok people should not be able to ban your shadow pick in normals
body:
I literally wasted like 30 min of my time in que.
I got 5 dodges ina row.
Then i got 2 games where im top and someone goes "can i top"
I say "no sorry i only panth" 
And then they fuckn ban panth.
I straight up afk on there asses after 3 min. im writing this while afk.
Its like fuck man you already get to enter with only knowing 2 roles..
If i didnt get top i wouldnt fuckn ban the our top laners pick.

Anytime i dont play with my premade i go on straight tilt.
